room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: This was awesome! I can't wait to go back and breakout of the other rooms. The staff was great too!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: I love Breakout Atlanta!Our team had a blast breaking out of the Museum Heist Room which was super hard but definitely worth it when we broke the record (challenge accepted, folks). The staff was friendly, encouraging, and made the whole experience even better.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: These guys are AWESOME!!. This was my first adventure like this and I'm glad it was with BREAKOUT.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Super fun time! Had a blast! The staff (Ben) was great and helpful when needed. Can't wait to do another room! Will definetely be back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Redefines what it means to have fun in Atlanta as a group !

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Such a dope experience lol I felt like an investigator and got the job done! With o my a minute left too!! Haha gotta try the other games soon!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Atlanta in Atlanta
review: This was the best team builder ever! Jake was a great Game Master!
